alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Foot Hills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Perkins; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 07 at 1:22PM MST until February 08 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern South Dakota, the northern and eastern foothills, and the plains just east of the Black Hills. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds are expected tonight with the initial frontal passage. Then there will be a bit of a lull early Tuesday morning, before winds increase again late Tuesday morning. Occasional gusts of 60 mph will be possible, especially across the foothills as the front passes tonight.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
